about_the_game:
The white kujin Azir challenges the traditions and demands a rematch. His appearance poses the risk of shattering this fragile peace and leading to all-out warfare. And in the heart of this conflict - Maya, our charming and amorous heroine.

Her unexpected acquaintance with the leader of mysterious sea folk and the mermaid's hospitality may forever change the fate of an entire island. For in the depths of the sea, an item of unimaginable power awaits Maya. What price will the tribe pay to find it first?

In this DLC, you'll uncover the grim mystery of the past, dive deep into intrigue, power and temptation - and get to be part of the island's history.

You'll have an amazing adventure ahead of you, including:

  • A new character

  • Hot H-scenes

  • A new location

  • Lots of new quests!

content_descriptors.notes:
All the characters are adults. The game contains nudity and sexual content. 

The game contains sexual scenes between the humans and the furries and the furry scenes.

The game contains adult material and scenes of a sexual nature with various fetishes that some viewers may find offensive: furry, oral, anal, vaginal, threesome (MMF), scenes with dildo, domination.

name: Lyndaria: Shadows of the Past DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
